ModMetaData.name: 海星的尖叫响彻环世界 Screaming Starfish for All Storytellers
ModMetaData.author: RunningBugs
ModMetaData.description:
叙事者——海星地联 是我这几天最喜欢的模组，可惜的是海星的尖叫只能在那一个叙事者下使用。
本模组能够为所有叙事者添加海星尖叫的效果。需要在原模组后加载。
Screaming Starfish is my favorite storyteller mod in the past few days, but unfortunately, the screaming effect can only be used with that specific storyteller.
This mod allows the screaming effect to be added to all storytellers. It needs to be loaded after the original mod.
